Anchor locations must comply with this report and the plans and specifications approved by the code official.
錨固位置必須遵守此報告和計畫以及批准之官方規範。
Anchoring element must be straight and free of oil and other contaminants.
錨固原料須未經使用且無油漬以及其他污染。
Anchors are embedded into concrete a minimum of 7 inches (178 mm).
錨固螺栓嵌入混凝土 7 英吋 (178 毫米)。
Anchors are located a minimum of 15 anchor diameters from the edge of the concrete perpendicular to the length of the track.
錨固螺栓距離垂直軌道長邊的混凝土邊緣至少 15 錨桿直徑。
Anchors are located a minimum of 1<t0/>3<t1/>/<t2/>4<t3/> inches (45 mm) from the edge of the concrete parallel to the length of the track.
錨固距離平行軌道長邊的混凝土邊緣至少 1<t0/>3<t1/>/<t2/>4<t3/>英吋 (45 毫米)。

Anchors designed to resist wall out-of-plane forces with design strengths equal to or greater than the force determined in accordance with ASCE 7 Equation 12.11-1 or 12.14-10 shall be deemed to satisfy Section D.3.3.4.3(d).
設計用於抵抗牆體平面外力的錨固，若等於或大於 ASCE 7 方程式 12.11-1 或 12.14-10ASCE 7 所決定的外力，則應視為滿足章節 D.3.3.4.3(d)。
Anchors must be installed in concrete base materials in holes predrilled in accordance with the instructions provided in Figure 4 of this report.
錨固必須依照本報告圖 4 指示，安裝在以預先鑽孔的混凝土基座材料上。
Any change in the anchor product being installed or the personnel performing the installation requires an initial inspection.
任何已安裝之錨固產品或執行安裝的人員更換皆需進行初始檢查。

fischer FIS EM ADHESIVE ANCHORING SYSTEM FOR CRACKED AND UNCRACKED CONCRETE
用於龜裂和無龜裂混凝土之 fischer FIS EM 黏結錨固系統

fischer FIS EM Adhesive Anchors are used to resist static, wind and earthquake (Seismic Design Categories A through F) tension and shear loads in cracked and uncracked normal-weight concrete having a specified compressive strength, <t0/>f′ <t1/>c<t2/>, of 2,500 psi to 8,500 psi <t3/>(17.2 MPa to 58.6 MPa).
fischer FIS EM 黏結錨固用於龜裂及無龜裂之一般重量混凝土以抵抗靜力、風以及地震 (抗震設計類別 A 至 F) 產生之張力及剪力負荷，其壓應力強度 <t0/>f′ <t1/>c<t2/> 介於 2,500 psi 至 8,500 psi <t3/>(17.2 MPa 至 58.6 MPa) 之間。

fischer FIS EM adhesive anchors are permitted to be installed in concrete that is cracked or that may be expected to crack during the service life of the anchor, subject to the conditions of this report.
根據本報告的條件，fischer FIS EM 黏合錨固可安裝在龜裂或預期在使用期間會龜裂之混凝土。
fischer FIS EM adhesive anchors are recognized for use to resist short- and long-term loads, including wind and earthquake loads, subject to the conditions of this report.
根據本報告的條件，fischer FIS EM 黏結錨固已公認可承受短時間和長時間的負荷，包括風力和地震負荷。
